DOC.brief_title: Adapting Web-based Instruction Baseline Knowledge Physicians-in-training
DOC.detailed_description: Not Web-based instruction equally effective facilitate learning . Adaptation characteristic individual learner may enhance Web-based learn emulate face-to-face teacher 's response learner 's need . Learner baseline knowledge level one variable Web-based instruction may adapt . We enhance Web-based instructional module use Internal Medicine resident continuity clinic adapt learner baseline knowledge . We compare adaptive Web-based format standard format . We hypothesize adaptive format higher learning efficiency , achievement similar two group . We also hypothesize resident prefer adaptive format find motivate standard format .
